<title level="1" right="Action">[Spring the Trap](/Actions.aspx?ID=1455) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 108</row>

**Trigger** You roll initiative.

</column>

---

You can Interact to draw a [combination](/Traits.aspx?ID=417) weapon and set it to melee or ranged mode. On your first turn, your movement and ranged attacks don't trigger reactions that are normally triggered by movement or a ranged attack (such as [Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)).
name: Spring the Trap
